artist: Author: Frank Guerrero , et al.; Publisher: Sylvie Myerson , et al., New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, abstracted photographic image of repeated figure and designs, with letterpress text, printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers; 49 pp.
medium: Color offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Sandbox, no. 7: ART VS. STATE: reclaiming public space through art
